scripts.start-all: npm install && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all  && nodemon ./bin/www
scripts.tests: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test && sequelize db:migrate --env=test && sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path=/usr/src/tests/seeders/  --env=test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.nyc_tests: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env=test && sequelize db:migrate --env=test  && sequelize db:seed:all --seeders-path=/usr/src/tests/seeders/  --env=test && NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/* --recursive --exit
scripts.reset_dev: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
